service.query: SELECT (CASE WHEN NVL(A.CONF_FLAG, 'N') = 'Y' THEN 'T' ELSE 'F' END) AS CONF_FLAG , A.STR_CD , A.DEPT_CD , A.TEAM_CD , A.PC_CD , B.ORG_SHORT_NAME AS ORG_NAME , A.EXE_YM AS YYYYMM , A.CONF_DT , SUM(A.ORIGIN_NORM_SAMT) AS ORIGIN_NORM_SAMT , SUM(A.ORIGIN_EVT_SAMT) AS ORIGIN_EVT_SAMT , SUM(A.ORIGIN_SALE_TAMT) AS ORIGIN_SALE_TAMT , SUM(A.ORIGIN_PROF_TAMT) AS ORIGIN_PROF_TAMT , 100 AS ORIGIN_SALE_CRATE , 100 AS ORIGIN_PROF_CRATE FROM DPS.PS_ACTPUMBUN A , DPS.PC_ORGMST B WHERE A.ORG_CD = B.ORG_CD AND A.STR_CD = B.STR_CD AND A.DEPT_CD = B.DEPT_CD AND A.TEAM_CD = B.TEAM_CD AND A.PC_CD = B.PC_CD AND A.STR_CD = ? AND A.DEPT_CD = ? AND A.TEAM_CD = ? AND A.PC_CD LIKE ? || '%' AND A.EXE_YM = ? AND EXISTS ( SELECT MYORG.USER_ID FROM COM.V_MYORG MYORG WHERE MYORG.STR_CD = B.STR_CD AND MYORG.DEPT_CD = B.DEPT_CD AND MYORG.TEAM_CD = B.TEAM_CD AND MYORG.PC_CD = B.PC_CD AND MYORG.USER_ID = ? ) AND EXISTS (SELECT PUMBUN_CD FROM DPS.PC_STRPBN WHERE STR_CD = A.STR_CD AND PUMBUN_CD = A.PUMBUN_CD AND BIZ_TYPE != '5' ) GROUP BY A.CONF_FLAG , A.STR_CD , A.DEPT_CD , A.TEAM_CD , A.PC_CD , B.ORG_SHORT_NAME , A.EXE_YM , A.CONF_DT ORDER BY A.STR_CD,A.DEPT_CD,A.TEAM_CD,A.PC_CD

SELECT 'N' CONF_FLAG, A.STR_CD,DEPT_CD,TEAM_CD,PC_CD,ORG_NAME,? YYYYMM,'' CONF_DT , 0 AS ORIGIN_NORM_SAMT , 0 AS ORIGIN_EVT_SAMT , 0 AS ORIGIN_SALE_TAMT , 0 AS ORIGIN_PROF_TAMT , 100 AS ORIGIN_SALE_CRATE , 100 AS ORIGIN_PROF_CRATE FROM (SELECT STR_CD,SALE_ORG_CD FROM (SELECT A.STR_CD,SALE_YM,A.PUMBUN_CD,PUMBUN_NAME,SALE_ORG_CD FROM DPS.PS_MONTHPBN A, DPS.PC_STRPBN B WHERE A.STR_CD = B.STR_CD AND A.PUMBUN_CD = B.PUMBUN_CD AND B.STR_CD = ? AND SALE_YM = TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(TO_DATE(?,'YYYYMM'),-1),'YYYYMM') AND SUBSTR(SALE_ORG_CD,3,2) = ? --DEPT_CD AND SUBSTR(SALE_ORG_CD,5,2) = ? --TEAM_CD AND SUBSTR(SALE_ORG_CD,7,2) LIKE ? || '%' --CD_CD AND A.PUMBUN_CD IN (SELECT MYORG.PUMBUN_CD FROM COM.V_MYORG MYORG WHERE MYORG.USER_ID = ? ) GROUP BY A.STR_CD,SALE_YM,A.PUMBUN_CD,PUMBUN_NAME,SALE_ORG_CD
UNION ALL
SELECT STR_CD,TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(TO_DATE(?,'YYYYMM'),-1),'YYYYMM') SALE_YM,PUMBUN_CD,PUMBUN_NAME,SALE_ORG_CD FROM DPS.PC_STRPBN WHERE REG_DATE >= ADD_MONTHS(TO_DATE(?,'YYYYMM'),-1) AND USE_YN = 'Y' AND TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD') BETWEEN APP_S_DT AND APP_E_DT AND STR_CD = ? AND SUBSTR(SALE_ORG_CD,3,2) = ? --DEPT_CD AND SUBSTR(SALE_ORG_CD,5,2) = ? --TEAM_CD AND SUBSTR(SALE_ORG_CD,7,2) LIKE ? || '%' --CD_CD AND PUMBUN_CD IN (SELECT MYORG.PUMBUN_CD FROM COM.V_MYORG MYORG WHERE MYORG.USER_ID = ? ) ) GROUP BY STR_CD,SALE_YM,SALE_ORG_CD) A, DPS.PC_ORGMST C WHERE A.STR_CD = C.STR_CD AND A.SALE_ORG_CD = C.ORG_CD ORDER BY A.STR_CD,DEPT_CD,TEAM_CD,PC_CD

SELECT A.STR_CD , ? EXE_YM , A.PUMBUN_CD , A.PUMBUN_NAME , A.ORG_CD , SUM(A.ORIGIN_SALE_TAMT) TOT_AMT , SUM((CASE WHEN A.DT = '1' THEN A.ORIGIN_SALE_TAMT ELSE 0 END) ) SALE01 , SUM((CASE WHEN A.DT = '2' THEN A.ORIGIN_SALE_TAMT ELSE 0 END) ) SALE02 , SUM((CASE WHEN A.DT = '3' THEN A.ORIGIN_SALE_TAMT ELSE 0 END) ) SALE03 , SUM((CASE WHEN A.DT = '4' THEN A.ORIGIN_SALE_TAMT ELSE 0 END) ) SALE04 , SUM((CASE WHEN A.DT = '5' THEN A.ORIGIN_SALE_TAMT ELSE 0 END) ) SALE05 , SUM((CASE WHEN A.DT = '6' THEN A.ORIGIN_SALE_TAMT ELSE 0 END) ) SALE06 , SUM((CASE WHEN A.DT = '7' THEN A.ORIGIN_SALE_TAMT ELSE 0 END) ) SALE07 , SUM((CASE WHEN A.DT = '8' THEN A.ORIGIN_SALE_TAMT ELSE 0 END) ) SALE08 , SUM((CASE WHEN A.DT = '9' THEN A.ORIGIN_SALE_TAMT ELSE 0 END) ) SALE09 , SUM((CASE WHEN A.DT = '10' THEN A.ORIGIN_SALE_TAMT ELSE 0 END) ) SALE10
, SUM((CASE WHEN A.DT = '11' THEN A.ORIGIN_SALE_TAMT ELSE 0 END) ) SALE11 , SUM((CASE WHEN A.DT = '12' THEN A.ORIGIN_SALE_TAMT ELSE 0 END) ) SALE12 , SUM((CASE WHEN A.DT = '13' THEN A.ORIGIN_SALE_TAMT ELSE 0 END) ) SALE13 , SUM((CASE WHEN A.DT = '14' THEN A.ORIGIN_SALE_TAMT ELSE 0 END) ) SALE14 , SUM((CASE WHEN A.DT = '15' THEN A.ORIGIN_SALE_TAMT ELSE 0 END) ) SALE15 , SUM((CASE WHEN A.DT = '16' THEN A.ORIGIN_SALE_TAMT ELSE 0 END) ) SALE16 , SUM((CASE WHEN A.DT = '17' THEN A.ORIGIN_SALE_TAMT ELSE 0 END) ) SALE17 , SUM((CASE WHEN A.DT = '18' THEN A.ORIGIN_SALE_TAMT ELSE 0 END) ) SALE18 , SUM((CASE WHEN A.DT = '19' THEN A.ORIGIN_SALE_TAMT ELSE 0 END) ) SALE19 , SUM((CASE WHEN A.DT = '20' THEN A.ORIGIN_SALE_TAMT ELSE 0 END) ) SALE20
, SUM((CASE WHEN A.DT = '21' THEN A.ORIGIN_SALE_TAMT ELSE 0 END) ) SALE21 , SUM((CASE WHEN A.DT = '22' THEN A.ORIGIN_SALE_TAMT ELSE 0 END) ) SALE22 , SUM((CASE WHEN A.DT = '23' THEN A.ORIGIN_SALE_TAMT ELSE 0 END) ) SALE23 , SUM((CASE WHEN A.DT = '24' THEN A.ORIGIN_SALE_TAMT ELSE 0 END) ) SALE24 , SUM((CASE WHEN A.DT = '25' THEN A.ORIGIN_SALE_TAMT ELSE 0 END) ) SALE25 , SUM((CASE WHEN A.DT = '26' THEN A.ORIGIN_SALE_TAMT ELSE 0 END) ) SALE26 , SUM((CASE WHEN A.DT = '27' THEN A.ORIGIN_SALE_TAMT ELSE 0 END) ) SALE27 , SUM((CASE WHEN A.DT = '28' THEN A.ORIGIN_SALE_TAMT ELSE 0 END) ) SALE28 , SUM((CASE WHEN A.DT = '29' THEN A.ORIGIN_SALE_TAMT ELSE 0 END) ) SALE29 , SUM((CASE WHEN A.DT = '30' THEN A.ORIGIN_SALE_TAMT ELSE 0 END) ) SALE30 , SUM((CASE WHEN A.DT = '31' THEN A.ORIGIN_SALE_TAMT ELSE 0 END) ) SALE31 , CONF_FLAG
FROM ( SELECT A.STR_CD , A.DEPT_CD , A.TEAM_CD , A.PC_CD , A.PUMBUN_CD , B.PUMBUN_NAME , (CASE WHEN SUBSTR(A.EXE_DT,7,2) < 10 THEN SUBSTR(A.EXE_DT,8,1) ELSE SUBSTR(A.EXE_DT, 7,2) END ) AS DT , A.BFYY_NORM_SAMT , A.ORIGIN_NORM_SAMT , A.BFYY_EVT_SAMT , A.ORIGIN_EVT_SAMT , A.BFYY_SALE_TAMT , A.ORIGIN_SALE_TAMT , A.BFYY_PROF_TAMT , A.ORIGIN_PROF_TAMT , A.BFYY_SALE_CRATE , A.ORIGIN_SALE_CRATE , A.BFYY_PROF_CRATE , A.ORIGIN_PROF_CRATE , A.CONF_FLAG , A.ORG_CD FROM DPS.PS_ACTPUMBUN A , DPS.PC_STRPBN B WHERE A.PUMBUN_CD = B.PUMBUN_CD AND A.STR_CD = B.STR_CD AND A.STR_CD = ? AND A.DEPT_CD = ? AND A.TEAM_CD = ? AND A.PC_CD = ? AND A.EXE_YM = ? AND A.PUMBUN_CD IN ( SELECT MYORG.PUMBUN_CD FROM COM.V_MYORG MYORG WHERE MYORG.USER_ID = ? ) ) A GROUP BY A.STR_CD , A.PUMBUN_CD , A.PUMBUN_NAME , A.CONF_FLAG , A.ORG_CD
ORDER BY SUBSTR(A.PUMBUN_NAME,1,INSTR(A.PUMBUN_NAME,'(',1)-1),DECODE(SUBSTR(A.PUMBUN_NAME,INSTR(A.PUMBUN_NAME,'(',1)+1,1),'정',0,'행',1,'온',2,3)

INSERT INTO DPS.PS_ACTPUMBUN SELECT A.STR_CD, ? EXE_YM, SALE_DT, PUMBUN_CD, SUBSTR(SALE_ORG_CD,1,8)||'00' ORG_CD, '4' ORG_LEVEL, SUBSTR(SALE_ORG_CD,5,2) TEAM_CD, SUBSTR(SALE_ORG_CD,3,2) DEPT_CD, SUBSTR(SALE_ORG_CD,7,2) PC_CD, '' SALE_ORG_CD, '' BUY_ORG_CD , 0 BFYY_NORM_SAMT , 0 BFYY_EVT_SAMT , 0 BFYY_SALE_TAMT , 0 BFYY_PROF_TAMT , 0 BFYY_PROF_CRATE , 0 BFYY_SALE_CRATE , 0 ORIGIN_NORM_SAMT , 0 ORIGIN_EVT_SAMT , 0 ORIGIN_SALE_TAMT , 0 ORIGIN_PROF_TAMT , 0 ORIGIN_PROF_CRATE , 0 ORIGIN_SALE_CRATE , 0 ORIGIN_SALE_IRATE , 0 ORIGIN_PROF_IRATE , '' CONF_DT , '' CONFID , 'N' CONF_FLAG , SYSDATE REG_DATE , ? REG_ID , SYSDATE MOD_DATE , ? MOD_ID FROM (SELECT STR_CD,SALE_DT,CMPR_DT, (CASE WHEN SUBSTR(SALE_DT,7,2) < 10 THEN SUBSTR(SALE_DT,8,1) ELSE SUBSTR(SALE_DT, 7,2) END ) AS DT FROM DPS.PS_SCHEDULE WHERE STR_CD = ? AND SALE_DT BETWEEN ?||'01' AND ?||'31') A, (SELECT STR_CD,PUMBUN_CD,PUMBUN_NAME,SALE_ORG_CD FROM (SELECT A.STR_CD,EXE_YM,A.PUMBUN_CD,PUMBUN_NAME,B.SALE_ORG_CD FROM DPS.PS_ACTPUMBUN A, DPS.PC_STRPBN B WHERE A.STR_CD = B.STR_CD AND A.PUMBUN_CD = B.PUMBUN_CD AND B.STR_CD = ? AND EXE_YM = TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(TO_DATE(?,'YYYYMM'),-1),'YYYYMM') GROUP BY A.STR_CD,EXE_YM,A.PUMBUN_CD,PUMBUN_NAME,B.SALE_ORG_CD
UNION ALL
SELECT STR_CD,TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(TO_DATE(?,'YYYYMM'),-1),'YYYYMM') SALE_YM,PUMBUN_CD,PUMBUN_NAME,SALE_ORG_CD FROM DPS.PC_STRPBN WHERE REG_DATE >= ADD_MONTHS(TO_DATE(?,'YYYYMM'),-1) AND USE_YN = 'Y' AND TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD') BETWEEN APP_S_DT AND APP_E_DT AND STR_CD = ? ) GROUP BY STR_CD,EXE_YM,PUMBUN_CD,PUMBUN_NAME,SALE_ORG_CD) B WHERE A.STR_CD = B.STR_CD AND (A.STR_CD,?,SALE_DT,PUMBUN_CD,SUBSTR(SALE_ORG_CD,1,8)||'00') NOT IN (SELECT STR_CD,EXE_YM,SALE_DT,PUMBUN_CD,ORG_CD FROM DPS.PS_ACTPUMBUN WHERE STR_CD = ? AND EXE_YM = ?) AND PUMBUN_CD IN (SELECT PUMBUN_CD FROM COM.V_MYORG WHERE USER_ID = ?)

SELECT DISTINCT A.CONF_FLAG FROM DPS.PS_ACTPUMBUN A WHERE A.STR_CD = ? AND A.ORG_LEVEL = '4' AND A.DEPT_CD = ? AND A.TEAM_CD = ? AND A.PC_CD = ? AND A.EXE_YM LIKE ? || '%' AND A.CONF_FLAG = 'Y' AND EXISTS (SELECT PUMBUN_CD FROM DPS.PC_STRPBN WHERE STR_CD = A.STR_CD AND PUMBUN_CD = A.PUMBUN_CD AND BIZ_TYPE != '5' )
SELECT DISTINCT 'Y' AS FLAG FROM DPS.PS_ACTPCWEIGHT A WHERE A.STR_CD = ? AND A.DEPT_CD = ? AND A.TEAM_CD = ? AND A.PC_CD = ? AND A.YYYYMM = ?
SELECT A.STR_CD , A.SALE_DT , A.CMPR_DT , A.CMPR_DAY FROM DPS.PS_SCHEDULE A WHERE A.STR_CD = ? AND A.SALE_DT = ?

INSERT INTO DPS.PS_ACTPUMBUN ( STR_CD , EXE_YM , EXE_DT , ORG_CD , PUMBUN_CD , ORG_LEVEL , DEPT_CD , TEAM_CD , PC_CD , BFYY_NORM_SAMT , BFYY_EVT_SAMT , BFYY_SALE_TAMT , BFYY_PROF_TAMT , BFYY_SALE_CRATE , BFYY_PROF_CRATE , ORIGIN_NORM_SAMT , ORIGIN_EVT_SAMT , ORIGIN_SALE_TAMT , ORIGIN_PROF_TAMT , ORIGIN_SALE_CRATE , ORIGIN_PROF_CRATE , ORIGIN_SALE_IRATE , ORIGIN_PROF_IRATE , REG_DATE , REG_ID , MOD_DATE , MOD_ID ) VALUES ( ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , SYSDATE , ? , SYSDATE , ? )

MERGE INTO DPS.PS_ACTPUMBUN A USING ( SELECT ? STR_CD, ? EXE_YM, ? EXE_DT, ? PUMBUN_CD, ?||?||?||?||'00' ORG_CD, '4' ORG_LEVEL, ? TEAM_CD, ? DEPT_CD, ? PC_CD, ? ORIGIN_NORM_SAMT, ? ORIGIN_SALE_TAMT ,'N' CONF_FLAG, ? REG_ID, SYSDATE REG_DATE FROM DUAL ) B ON (A.STR_CD = B.STR_CD AND A.EXE_YM = B.EXE_YM AND A.EXE_DT = B.EXE_DT AND A.PUMBUN_CD = B.PUMBUN_CD AND A.ORG_CD = B.ORG_CD) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET A.ORIGIN_NORM_SAMT = B.ORIGIN_NORM_SAMT , A.ORIGIN_SALE_TAMT = B.ORIGIN_SALE_TAMT , A.MOD_DATE = B.REG_DATE , A.MOD_ID = B.REG_ID
WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT (A.STR_CD,A.EXE_YM,A.EXE_DT,A.PUMBUN_CD,A.ORG_CD,A.ORG_LEVEL,A.TEAM_CD,A.DEPT_CD,A.PC_CD,A.ORIGIN_NORM_SAMT,A.ORIGIN_SALE_TAMT,A.CONF_FLAG,A.REG_DATE,A.REG_ID,A.MOD_DATE,A.MOD_ID) VALUES (B.STR_CD,B.EXE_YM,B.EXE_DT,B.PUMBUN_CD,B.ORG_CD,B.ORG_LEVEL,B.TEAM_CD,B.DEPT_CD,B.PC_CD,B.ORIGIN_NORM_SAMT,B.ORIGIN_SALE_TAMT,B.CONF_FLAG,B.REG_DATE,B.REG_ID,B.REG_DATE,B.REG_ID)
UPDATE DPS.PS_ACTTEAM SET CONF_DT = ? , CONF_ID = ? , CONF_FLAG = ? , MOD_DATE = SYSDATE , MOD_ID = ? WHERE STR_CD = ? AND DEPT_CD = ? AND TEAM_CD = ? AND EXE_YM = ? AND NVL(CONF_FLAG,'N') = ?

UPDATE DPS.PS_ACTPC SET CONF_DT = ? , CONF_ID = ? , CONF_FLAG = ? , MOD_DATE = SYSDATE , MOD_ID = ? WHERE STR_CD = ? AND DEPT_CD = ? AND TEAM_CD = ? AND PC_CD = ? AND ORG_LEVEL = '4' AND EXE_YM = ? AND NVL(CONF_FLAG,'N') = ?

UPDATE DPS.PS_ACTPUMBUN A SET CONF_DT = ? , CONF_ID = ? , CONF_FLAG = ? , MOD_DATE = SYSDATE , MOD_ID = ? WHERE STR_CD = ? AND DEPT_CD = ? AND TEAM_CD = ? AND PC_CD = ? AND ORG_LEVEL = '4' AND EXE_YM = ? AND NVL(CONF_FLAG,'N') = ? AND EXISTS (SELECT PUMBUN_CD FROM DPS.PC_STRPBN WHERE STR_CD = A.STR_CD AND PUMBUN_CD = A.PUMBUN_CD AND BIZ_TYPE != '5' )
DELETE DPS.PS_ACTPCWEIGHT WHERE STR_CD = ? AND DEPT_CD = ? AND TEAM_CD = ? AND PC_CD = ? AND PUMBUN_CD = ? AND EXE_YM = ? AND EXE_DT = ?
